name: Determinants of Health, and Health Disparities
description: This course will introduce students to the population health approach (including health policy) that takes action on the factors, and the interrelationships between factors, that contribute to health and health disparities. Key determinants of health as described by the Public Health Agency of Canada will be examined using case studies.
prerequisites: HLTB22H3 or HLTC05H3 [Note: HLTC05H3 may also be taken as a co-requisite]
